publications.title: Scaling Laws for Multimodal Reasoning in Vision-Language Models
publications.abstract: We investigate how reasoning capabilities in vision-language models scale with compute, data, and model size. Our findings reveal distinct scaling behaviors for different types of multimodal reasoning tasks.

publications.title: Circuit Discovery in Large Language Models via Automated Interpretability
publications.abstract: We present a novel approach to automatically discover circuits in large language models using gradient-based attribution and causal intervention methods.

publications.title: Neural-Symbolic Integration for Scientific Hypothesis Generation
publications.abstract: We develop a hybrid system that combines neural language models with symbolic reasoning engines to generate and validate scientific hypotheses in biology.

publications.title: Whole-Cell Modeling with Differentiable Simulation
publications.abstract: We introduce a fully differentiable whole-cell simulation framework that enables end-to-end learning of cellular dynamics from experimental data.

publications.title: Superposition and Feature Splitting in Transformer Residual Streams
publications.abstract: We study how features are represented in transformer models, finding evidence for both superposition and feature splitting across different layers.

publications.title: Cross-Modal Alignment Without Paired Data
publications.abstract: We propose a method for aligning representations across modalities using only unpaired data and self-supervised objectives.
